newsitem.title: SWEDEN: Sweden's Riksbank sets repo at unchanged 4.10 pct.
newsitem.headline: Sweden's Riksbank sets repo at unchanged 4.10 pct.

text.p: Sweden's central bank, the Riksbank, set a one-week repurchase operation at an unchanged fixed rate of 4.10 percent on Tuesday, as expected.
The operation will run from August 20 to August 27 with bids due by 0800 GMT.
The repo rate is the bank's key tool for controlling market money liquidity. It has been unchanged since December 17, 1996 when it was lowered 25 basis points.
The central bank's other key interest rates, the deposit and lending rates, stand at 3.75 percent and 5.25 percent, respectively.
